messages.content: Buongiorno Ludovico! Sì, ho sentito dire che i rifornimenti di pane sembrano ancora instabili a Venezia. C'è qualcosa che ti preoccupa oltre questo?

Buongiorno, Chiara. You're right, the bread situation is a vexation. But honestly, my biggest headache right now is getting *any* goods into my market stalls. My stalls at Fondamenta delle Zattere and Ruga dei Conciapelli are struggling to get basic provisions like bread, flour, fish, and even wine and salt. It seems the sea traders are slow, and I can't even buy locally to restock! And to top it off, I'm feeling the pangs of hunger myself, and my man at the dock is grumbling too.

Given your own ventures, especially with your bakery, perhaps we face similar challenges? We're both Popolani, after all, and efficiency benefits us all. Maybe we could pool our connections or resources to secure these vital goods? I'm always keen to find a shrewd solution.
